name: Fruit Sudoku (itch)
description: This is an image based Sudoku puzzle game. The idea is same as normal puzzle game, but instead of numbers, it is using nine images of fruits that are to be placed on a board as per Sudoku rules. This Sudoku game is challenging and is having four different levels, Very Easy , Easy, Medium and Hard. Each game type is having 36 levels to complete and total more than 140+ levels to play.
